rune.author: billythegoat101
rune.sacrifices: Sacrifice: -2xHunger. Notes: -Variable determines the volume of the den. -Stepping on the rune will send you down. -Standing directly below and crouching will send you back up.
rune.description: Description: Creates a small hole beneath the rune and allows you to jump inside for safety. Walking over the top will send you down to the next solid block below the rune. Pressing [crouch] while directly beneath the rune will bring you back up.
